attributes.action: make August 4th National Cake Day, with free cake for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the true value of cake is not fully appreciated in British society, and that we need a day that recognises cake for the great contribution it has made towards our heritage. We propose that August the 4th should be made a national holiday, with street carnivals, music, dancing and free cake for all!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
